import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import './Login.css'; import Facebook from './Facebook'; // Components : import Navbar from '../Components/Navbar'; import { Container, Row, Col, Image, Modal, Form // Nav, } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Link, Redirect, } from 'react-router-dom'; // Icons & Images: import { IoIosClose } from 'react-icons/io'; const LANDING_IMG = require('../../assets/images/login/landing-img.png'); const MIND_ICON = require('../../assets/images/login/mind.png'); const CHATBOT_ICON = require('../../assets/images/login/chatbot.png'); // const MIND_ICON_W = require('../../assets/images/login/mind_w.png'); // const CHATBOT_ICON_W = require('../../assets/images/login/chatbot_w.png'); const CORE_AI_ICON = require('../../assets/images/login/coreai.svg'); // const CORE_AI_ICON_W = require('../../assets/images/login/coreai_w.svg'); function LandingPage() { // To hover on the card: // const [hoverCard,setHoverCard] = useState(false); // const [hoverCard1,setHoverCard1] = useState(false); // const [hoverCard2,setHoverCard2] = useState(false); const [showContact, setShowContact] = useState(false); const auth_token = localStorage.getItem('authtoken'); const userData = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('userData')); const allMenuItems = [ { title: 'Contact us' , route: 'contact-link' }, { title: 'How to use it' , route: 'link-how-to-use' }, { title: 'For developpers' , route: 'link-for-devs' } ]; const renderContactModal = () => ( { setShowContact(false) }} />

 ) } export default LandingPage;
